name: INFeD
indications: infed indicated treatment adult pediatric patients age 4 months older documented iron deficiency intolerance oral iron unsatisfactory response oral iron .
contraindications: full prescribing information weight-based dosing information . ( 2 )
warningsAndPrecautions: infed ( iron dextran injection usp ) containing 50 mg elemental iron per ml , available dark brown , slightly viscous , sterile solution 2 ml single-dose amber vials cartons 10 ( ndc 0023-6082-10 ) .
adverseReactions: infed contraindicated patients demonstrated previous hypersensitivity iron dextran [ ( 5.1 ) ] .
indications_original: INFeD is indicated for treatment of adult and pediatric patients of age 4 months and older with documented iron deficiency who have intolerance to oral iron or have had an unsatisfactory response to oral iron.
contraindications_original: See Full Prescribing Information for weight-based dosing and administration information. ( 2 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original: INFeD (iron dextran injection USP) containing 50 mg of elemental iron per mL, is available as a dark brown, slightly viscous, sterile solution in 2 mL single-dose amber vials in cartons of 10 (NDC 0023-6082-10).
